name: AddLive
description: AddLive is a simple, developer friendly way to integrate live video and voice into applications. We see great opportunity in real-time applications, and believe that live video and voice will be used in many apps. Our aim is to empower the developer community to build tomorrow’s real-time applications by giving them easy access to this technology.
